main event: A couple observed a cigar-shaped UFO with a jet stream appearance in the sky on August 26, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting occurred between 9:58 PM and 10:05 PM,The object was brightly lit, approximately 1Â½ times as bright as the moon,The couple saw the UFO pass in front of the moon with no sound audible,The object was observed for about 3 minutes before disappearing to the east, The witness was an engineer for the University of Chicago.
sighted object: a cigar-shaped object with a jet stream appearance
witness description: a couple watching the phenomenon from their home
